subject: Football
Human Growth Hormone
Tests (Drug Use)
Steroids
Collective Bargaining
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Some antidoping experts say that the true effectiveness and legitimacy of the league’s H.G.H. program will be known only when the league and the players’ union reveal the details.
snippet: Some antidoping experts say that the true effectiveness and legitimacy of the league’s H.G.H. program will be known only when the league and the players’ union reveal the details.
